summary: Texas is the second largest state in the United States.
full_text:
Jourdanton is a city in and the county seat of Atascosa County, Texas, United States. The population was 3,871 at the 2010 census. It is part of the San Antonio Metropolitan Statistical Area.
^ "American FactFinder". United States Census Bureau. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "US Board on Geographic Names". United States Geological Survey. 2007-10-25. Retrieved 2008-01-31. 
^ "Find a County". National Association of Counties. Retrieved 2011-06-07. 
^ "Geographic Identifiers: 2010 Demographic Profile Data : Jourdanton city, Texas". U.S. Census Bureau, American Factfinder. Retrieved August 23, 2013.
title: Jourdanton, Texas
